messages.subject: Fuun Shinsengumi Sequel
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.shinsengumimb.com is under maintenance tonight...so I had to post this here... GENKI to release Fuun Shinsengumi sequel GameSpot - USA ... Fuun
messages.messageBody:
http://www.shinsengumimb.com
is under maintenance tonight...so I had to post this here...

GENKI to release Fuun Shinsengumi sequel
GameSpot - USA
... Fuun Bakumatsuden. The game is the sequel to Fuun Shinsengumi, which
was released for PlayStation 2 by the company in January. The ...
<http://www.gamespot.com/ps2/action/fuunbakumatsuden/news_6105446.html>
http://ps2.ign.com/articles/541/541377p1.html

[Reminder] please be sure to go to
http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3
password makoto
and download what you want because this is the *last* month it will be
available
